meanings.definition: A Greek dish made with spinach and feta cheese baked in layers of phyllo dough.
meanings.sent1: I tried spanakopita for the first time at the Greek restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My mom baked delicious spanakopita for our family dinner.
meanings.sent3: The spanakopita was so flaky and tasty, it disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills were like spanakopita, layered with expertise and flavor.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked spanakopita filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A savory pastry filled with spinach and cheese.
meanings.sent1: At the bakery, I bought a warm spanakopita for a quick snack.
meanings.sent2: During the party, the guests enjoyed the crispy spanakopita appetizers.
meanings.sent3: The spanakopita told a cheesy joke, making everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as comforting as a warm spanakopita on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The golden-brown crust of the spanakopita crumbled with each bite, revealing the savory filling inside.
